LinkedIn Focus Mode is an extension designed to keep you busy with the important things on your LinkedIn journey. 

The app has three main features: 
-- Focus Mode: Blocks your entire feed, while allowing you to send your messages and catch up with the conversations you need to cater to. 

--Remove Sponsored Posts: Blocks all ads and sponsorships from appearing in your feed. 

-- Remove Reaction Posts: Blocks all posts that are being displayed through other people's activities. 

Improve your LinkedIn experience, and focus on what matters with LinkedIn Focus Mode. 

We do not store any information or data whatsoever. The extension is totally free to use as well. 

Disclaimer: the use of the extension may violate LinkedIn TOS, so please use it at your own discretion.
